long_description: This collapsible monopod sets up quickly and doubles as a walking staff--great for lightweight packers who use binoculars, scopes or cameras. Manufactured using durable, corrosion-resistant anodized aluminum. Mounting post is a standard 1/4 - 20 thread. Leg adjusts from 25.5 to 62.5 inches for use on almost any surface. Rubberized tip on the end of the leg for no-slip use. Use with Brunton's E-Triad Adapter, sold separately.
short_description: This collapsible monopod sets up quickly and doubles as a walking staff--great for lightweight packers who use binoculars, scopes or cameras.
